text:
An
otherwise valid Sec 7(f) contract will not be invalidated because of the
failure to pay time and a half for the hours in excess of the contract maximum
hours in weeks in which the employer has availed himself of an applicable OT
exemption.
html: An otherwise valid Sec 7(f) contract will not be invalidated because of the failure to pay time and a half for the hours in excess of the contract maximum hours in weeks in which the employer has availed himself of an applicable OT exemption.
